name: Purple (Fede Makes Games)
description:
During March 2021 I took part in a Creative Quest Club, organized by the lovely people at Channel Twelve.

The quest theme was *Colour* and together with Sylvia Morgado and Hannah Fullop, we embarked in an exploration of the color purple. 

This small space is an attempt to gather things and intuitions that have come along. It lasts about 5 minutes, and it's a quiet place to stay. 

Hope you'll enjoy.

  • Written by Federico Fasce
  • Artwork and poem by Sylvia Morgado
  • Photos by Hannah Fullop
